articles.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows PC Requirements Revealed – RTX 4090 for 4K@60 with Max Ray Tracing - Wccftech
articles.description: Ubisoft has revealed the official PC system requirements for Assassin's Creed Shadows. Pre-orders are also now open on all platforms.
articles.content: Ubisoft has just opened the pre-orders for Assassin's Creed Shadows, and in doing so, they also revealed the official PC system requirements. We already knew the game would be rather heavy, which the… [+3815 chars]
